entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 5 except temperature steady near plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Rain showers or periods of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog becoming fog patches near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5 except temperature steady near plus 2 along parts of the coast. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers or periods of drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High 7 except plus 3 in onshore winds.
